overview:
Daniel Lyons is a senior editor at Forbes magazine. He has written a book of short stories, The Last Good Man, a novel, Dog Days and a fictional biography, Options: The Secret Life of Steve Jobs, a Parody. He also writes The Secret Diary of Steve Jobs, a popular blog and parody of Apple CEO Steve Jobs, under the pseudonym Fake Steve Jobs. Before joining Forbes Dan taught at the University of Michigan and the University of Toledo.

via: Dan Lyons Wiki and Personal Blog
